live_updates: Technicians continue to work to restore service to all customers as quickly possible. Thank you for your patience.  We will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available.
Technicians are still on site working to resolve this as soon as possible.
On-site technicians continue working diligently to resolve this outage.
Due to the complexity of this outage, our technicians are still working to resolve.
Our technicians continue to repair services through the night. We apologize for the extended disruption.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
45581.summary: Some customers from Michipicoten to Wawa are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
45581.title: Jan 4 - From Michipicoten to Wawa | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
